unnormalised: I'm trying to figure out where to send some documents to the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE). Does anyone have the address?
normalised: I'm trying to figure out where to send some documents to the C-B-S-E. Does anyone have the address?

unnormalised: For official correspondence with the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE), it's generally advisable to use their primary administrative office address. As of my last update, the main office is located at: CBSE, Shiksha Kendra, 2, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-110092. This address is typically used for general inquiries, document submissions, and other routine communication.
normalised: For official correspondence with the C-B-S-E, it's generally advisable to use their primary administrative office address. As of my last update, the main office is located at: C-B-S-E, Shiksha Kendra, two, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and ninety two. This address is typically used for general inquiries, document submissions, and other routine communication.

unnormalised: However, for specific regions or zones, CBSE also has regional offices. For example, if you are located in Chennai, you might want to direct your correspondence to the CBSE Regional Office, Chennai, which is located at: CBSE Regional Office, New No. 3, J Block, 16th Main Road, Anna Nagar West, Chennai – 600040. Similarly, other regions like Ajmer, Allahabad, and Guwahati have their own regional offices; ensure you find the correct address relevant to your zone from the CBSE website.
normalised: However, for specific regions or zones, C-B-S-E also has regional offices. For example, if you are located in Chennai, you might want to direct your correspondence to the C-B-S-E Regional Office, Chennai, which is located at: C-B-S-E Regional Office, New Number three, J Block, sixteenth Main Road, Anna Nagar West, Chennai – six hundred thousand and forty. Similarly, other regions like Ajmer, Allahabad, and Guwahati have their own regional offices; ensure you find the correct address relevant to your zone from the C-B-S-E website.

unnormalised: Keep in mind that addresses can change, so it's best practice to verify the most current address on the official CBSE website (cbse.nic.in) before sending any important documents. You can typically find the relevant addresses under the "Contact Us" or "Regional Offices" section of the website. Also, confirm the postal code as incorrect postal codes can delay delivery.
normalised: Keep in mind that addresses can change, so it's best practice to verify the most current address on the official C-B-S-E website (c b s e dot n i c dot in) before sending any important documents. You can typically find the relevant addresses under the "Contact Us" or "Regional Offices" section of the website. Also, confirm the postal code as incorrect postal codes can delay delivery.
